thread_title: System Housekeeping and Fitness App MVP Build Session

1_narrative.title: Narrative & Context
items: Session focused on system housekeeping for Enterprise OS V7 and initiating the build of a Fitness App MVP.
Conducted a full review of all Enterprise OS V7 documentation, correcting a stale pillar reference.
Created foundational system documents (SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md, daily practices, build itinerary).
Identified scattered content folders needing ingestion into the Knowledge Library.
Began building the Fitness App MVP for AI workout generation and health journaling.

2_objectives.title: Objectives
items: Review and correct Enterprise OS V7 documentation.
Establish system housekeeping and foundational working documents.
Build a Fitness App MVP (AI workout generation + health journaling).
Identify and plan ingestion of scattered content into the Knowledge Library.

3_success_criteria.title: Success Criteria
items: Canonical pillar count corrected from 38 to 23 across system docs.
SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md created to guide LLM session starts.
Daily working practices document (PIL_10) established.
Enterprise OS build itinerary created.
Fitness App MVP built and functional.

4_decisions.title: Decisions & Rules
items: Fitness app is a health imperative and must be built TODAY.
Enterprise OS progress will be made in small daily increments, avoiding 'death marches'.
All session outputs must be placed in the V7 folder, nowhere else.

5_sops.title: SOPs / Workflows
items: Session archival workflow for the Knowledge Library is now working.
Daily working practices defined in PIL_10_WORKING_PRACTICES/DAILY_PRACTICES.md.

7_inputs_outputs.title: Inputs & Outputs
items: Inputs: All Enterprise OS V7 documentation, scattered content in Downloads folders.

Outputs: 00_SYSTEM_ROOT/SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md, PIL_10_WORKING_PRACTICES/DAILY_PRACTICES.md, 01_NAVIGATION_CENTRE/ENTERPRISE_OS_BUILD_ITINERARY.md, Fitness App MVP in 07_BUILD_FACTORY/PRJ_Fitness_Platform/.

8_missteps.title: Missteps / Errors / Risks
items: Stale reference to '38 pillars' was present and needed correction to the canonical 23 pillars for V7.
Risk: Scattered content in bucket folders (Downloads) risks being lost or unsynthesized if not ingested.

10_status.title: Status
items: System housekeeping and documentation corrections are complete.
Fitness App MVP build is in progress.
Ingestion of scattered bucket folders is pending.

11_progress.title: Progress Markers
items: Pillar count corrected in ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md and MEMORY.md.
SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md created.
Knowledge Library sorting and session archival operational.
Daily Working Practices doc (PIL_10) created.
Enterprise OS build itinerary created.
Fitness App MVP development initiated.

12_refinements.title: Refinements
items: Refined pillar count from 38 (old UI kits reference) to the canonical 23 pillars for Enterprise OS V7.

13_dependencies.title: Dependencies
items: Fitness App MVP depends on the 07_BUILD_FACTORY/PRJ_Fitness_Platform/ directory structure.
Enterprise OS build itinerary depends on the 01_NAVIGATION_CENTRE.
Knowledge Library ingestion depends on accessing the scattered content in Downloads folders.

14_entities.title: Entity Maps
items: Enterprise OS V7: Core system with 23 canonical pillars.
Knowledge Library: Central repository for session archival and ingested content.
SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md: File in 00_SYSTEM_ROOT guiding LLM session initialization.
PIL_10: Directory for working practices (DAILY_PRACTICES.md).
01_NAVIGATION_CENTRE: Location for the ENTERPRISE_OS_BUILD_ITINERARY.md.
07_BUILD_FACTORY/PRJ_Fitness_Platform/: Project directory for the Fitness App MVP.

Scattered Bucket Folders: Downloads/Notebook EnterpriseOS summary/ (19 docs, HIGH priority), Downloads/Enterprise_OS/ (8 threads + 32 artifacts, MEDIUM), Downloads/All_Enterprise_OS/V7 Collective Docs/ (83 files, LOW).

15_glossary.title: Glossary
items: Pillars: Foundational components of the Enterprise OS (23 in V7).
Death marches: Unsustainable, intensive work sprints to be avoided.
MVP: Minimum Viable Product.
Ingestion: Process of importing scattered content into the structured Knowledge Library.

16_future.title: Future
items: Continue building the Fitness App MVP if not completed in this session.
Start ingesting the identified scattered bucket folders into the Knowledge Library.
Begin a LeadEngine build sprint (conditional on it being Monday).

17_pending.title: Pending
items: Fitness App MVP completion.
Ingestion of scattered content from Downloads folders into the Knowledge Library.

19_meta.title: Meta-Observations
items: Session successfully combined high-level system housekeeping with concrete project (Fitness App) development.
Pattern of correcting legacy documentation references (pillar count) to maintain a single source of truth.
Explicit decision to avoid large sprints ('death marches') for the Enterprise OS in favor of sustainable daily progress.

20_assets.title: Reusable Assets
items: SESSION_BOOTSTRAP.md template for LLM session initialization.
DAILY_PRACTICES.md framework for working habits.
ENTERPRISE_OS_BUILD_ITINERARY.md as a project planning template.
Fitness App MVP codebase in 07_BUILD_FACTORY/PRJ_Fitness_Platform/.

summary: This session involved system documentation review and correction for Enterprise OS V7, the creation of foundational operational documents, and the initiation of a Fitness App MVP build. Key decisions were made to prioritize the fitness app for health and to adopt sustainable daily progress for the Enterprise OS. Next steps include completing the app and ingesting identified scattered content.
